Doc: A type defining a step date and step value pair. This step definitions are used to define varying rate or amount schedules, e.g. a notional amortization or a step-up coupon schedule.

Source.Contents:
/#
   A type defining a step date and step value pair. This step definitions are used to define varying rate or amount schedules, e.g. a notional amortization or a step-up coupon schedule.
 #/
trait FpML5.reporting.StepBase {
  # The date on which the associated stepValue becomes effective. This day may be subject to adjustment in accordance with a business day convention.
  stepDate : date?

  id : string?

}

stepDate.Doc: The date on which the associated stepValue becomes effective. This day may be subject to adjustment in accordance with a business day convention.
stepDate.Name: stepDate
